Capacity development is a fundamental component of the 1996 Safe Drinking Water Act (SDWA) Amendments.

Bing.text: The terms ‘training’ and ‘capacity development’ are sometimes confused or used interchangeably. E-diplomacy illustrates very well the difference between training and capacity development.
